answers.answer: Youve posted in a diabetes forum. I suggest talking to your doctor about the nodes.
Obviously the PET was ordered to verify suspicious activity in your body unrelated to diabetes. Ask your doctor for the Radiologist report, review it, then discuss the findings with your doctor.

question: in my PET SCAN,enhancing multiple lymph nodes have been seen in my whole body from neck to stomach.what is the cause?i am a none smoker.
title: enhancing multiple lymph nodes
